Functional Functional Always active 
The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network.
Preferences Preferences
The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user.
Statistics Statistics
The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you.
Marketing Marketing
The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes.

## Product overview
Fleet Planner - "Optimize your Fleet"Fleet on Demand - "Book a shipment"Analytics - "Control your emissions"
### Fleet Planner
Get full visibility of your internal and outsourced fleet in one place and take control of your logistics. Update routes, time slots and drivers, and **ship more with less.**
  * Manage your fleet in real time
  * Proof of delivery, customer ETA and more
  * User friendly Driver app included

[Book a demoFind out more](https://www.alrik.com/</case>)
[Find out moreContact us](https://www.alrik.com/</case>)
### Fleet on Demand
Use Alrik's "Fleet on Demand" Carrier Network to ship goods to your customers instantly. Get access to the vehicles and carriers you need, whenever you need them.
  * Book Express or Scheduled shipments with your own time and urgency settings
  * Save time and money with upfront dynamic pricing
  * Digital customer experience - with your company brand

[Book a shipmentFind out more](https://www.alrik.com/</case>)
[Find out moreContact us](https://www.alrik.com/</case>)
### Cost and emission insights
Access the data you need to improve your business and share it with your customers - they will need it.
  * Measure cost and emissions by vehicle, customer, project and more
  * Cost overview - what do you actually pay for your fleet?
  * Centralize your logistics decision making without compromising your offering

[Find out moreFind out more](https://www.alrik.com/</case>)
[Find out moreContact us](https://www.alrik.com/</case>)

### Increased sales
Sales teams use Alrik to exceed targets without compromising their organisations' logistics capacity.

We operate in the ever evolving IT landscape and provide business advantages through cloud based services. We integrate and extend existing infrastructure with public cloud platforms for flexible, consumption based IT models.

## Cloud architecture and development
We provide technical services and expertise across all major hyper-scalers. We do bespoke development of applications using the very latest technologies made available and provide ready-to-use platforms for Medtech and Fintech with overseeable and manageable dashboards.
[What we do](https://www.molnarkitekt.se/</services/>)

## AI Factory
With our platform, you can access our comprehensive algorithms from customised machines that you can export as containers or pre-baked virtual machines.
Our platform provides algorithms as open and transparent entities – search, use and share algorithms efficiently and effectively. Build sophisticated algorithms instantaneously without having to rewrite and retest code ad infinitum.

![](https://www.molnarkitekt.se/)
## MedTech
We enable the MedTech field platforms to deliver precision-defined genomics analysis processing of large volumes of genomics data.
Our customers like our easy to use, scalable and automated data solutions to serve their specific genomics or multiomics method or application. We develop your tailored solution in partnership with you and with full transparency.
[Read more](https://www.molnarkitekt.se/</services/medtech/>)
![](https://www.molnarkitekt.se/)
## FinTech
Our data analysis and machine learning systems allow you to analyse growing data from the Forex (FX) markets through our custom built dashboard.
We build our algorithms in the actual context and extract information for decision making. Furthermore, we have designed algorithms to operate different strategies without the need for human supervision.
[Read more](https://www.molnarkitekt.se/</services/fintech/>)
## We are looking for demanding tasks
We are open for your challenge.

## About us
We have the expertise to support and manage multiple clouds, something that even some large organisations are lacking in this space. We have our headquarters located in Stockholm where most of our support, architecture and optimization takes place.
We have resources in Europe, Canada, South America and Southeast Asia where we provide out of hours support and remote work. Depending on project sensitivity we deploy our resources from different teams across the globe. **We can provide 24/7 support.**
We can ensure operational excellence by conducting key actions such as change management, incident investigation and resolution, patching, security and access management, as well as providing reports relating to the health of your environment.
